alert.note: Alert for Butler; Lancaster; Saunders; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 8:26PM CDT until May 07 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lancaster County in southeastern Nebraska... Northeastern Seward County in southeastern Nebraska... Southeastern Butler County in east central Nebraska... Southwestern Saunders County in east central Nebraska... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 826 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Pleasant Dale, or 8 miles southeast of Seward, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Garland around 835 PM CDT. Malcolm around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Valparaiso. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska near mile marker 385. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
